96011518411296768.name: Reggie, the Regicider
96011518411296768.bio: Which role will you pick to defeat the kingslayer for the RPG Badge?

112662192523853824.name: Scotty Appleseed, the Folk Hero
112662192523853824.bio: An apple a day keeps the doctor away, but a victory over Scotty will award you with the Appleseed Badge!

180177605213814784.name: Ghastly Nyx, the Collector of Haunted Antiquities
180177605213814784.bio: Bring in Dark and Ghost attacks to quell his restless soul to earn yourself the Spirit Badge!

184044806564085761.name: Roxas, the Over-Caffeinated Admin
184044806564085761.bio: Overcome the aroma of coffee and earn the Caffeinated Badge!

223983174550683648.name: Brantley, the Enigmatic Ghost Biologist
223983174550683648.bio: Those who manage not to fall to trickery will be awarded the Silph Badge!

259658592573980673.name: Cynthia??, the Supposed Sinnoh Champion
259658592573980673.bio: Battle this almost familiar foe to get the Teardrop Badge!

283942447241887744.name: Dosháraithe, the Invincible
283942447241887744.bio: Exploit Dosháraithe's weaknesses to earn the Hamartia Badge!

340559329000423424.name: Valeera, the Venomous Apothecary
340559329000423424.bio: Exploit Dosháraithe's weaknesses to earn the Hamartia Badge!

407296387722641408.name: Mariana, Explorer of the Depths
407296387722641408.bio: Will you be spooked under pressure and call S.O.S, or will your shocking ingenuity prevail and earn you the Mayday Badge?

414424342395617281.name: Touma, the Imagine Breaker
414424342395617281.bio: Break the imagination of victory before yours gets broken! Power through Touma's team to earn the Breaker Badge!

429744942345224192.name: Professor Forsythia, the Pika-Clone Scientist
429744942345224192.bio: Help Professor Forsythia with her research and win yourself the Chu-DNA Badge!

432160369264558106.name: Prof. Wattieza, the Primal Historian
432160369264558106.bio: Can you overcome their primal might and win the Paleo Badge, or become ancient history?

568164754435342356.name: Yoshi, the Wing Buffer
568164754435342356.bio: Take flight and rise to the challenge to earn the Wing Badge!

945489787169697852.name: Percy Pascal, the Pink Pokémon Prince
945489787169697852.bio: Prepare your most perfect Pokémon to play with Percy's Pink Pantheon of Pokés to earn the Neo Pink Badge!
